nodes.text: Darth Noctyss was a female Sith Lord who, according to legend, traveled to Exegol seeking immortality, and ravaged many worlds in her search. After encountering a being that she did not realize was Darth Sanguis, who had obtained immortality on Exegol albeit as a twisted creature, Sanguis became her servant. Deep in Exegol's crust, Noctyss discovered Sanguis' lab and notes on the ritual. After much study, she completed the three-day ritual, sacrificing Sanguis. The ritual then twisted her into a creature much like Sanguis had become, revealing to her that her servant, whom she suddenly understood had been Sanguis, had manipulated her to be freed of his immortal fate.
Darth Noctyss was able to utilize Force lightning, and used a cloak and hood to mask her identity. Noctyss also utilized a Sith lightsaber with a curved blade that was specific to a particular Sith.
Darth Noctyss appeared in 2020 in "A Life Immortal," a story within the book Dark Legends, written and illustrated by George Mann and Grant Griffin, respectively.
